content: 1 weaving willow shawl design by oktarine this pattern is for personal use only materials yarn 1000 meters of fingering weight yarn 450 g/1000 m hook 3 5 mm the shawl in the pictures was made with scheepjes whirl 60% cotton 40% acrylic in the color pistaci oh so nice starting from the middle of the skein stitches used chain chain double_crochet double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet ps puff of 9 loops single_crochet single_crochet picot the first 3 chain of every row count as 1 double_crochet stitches between ** are repeated until the tip/end of the row stiches in green are done in the tip of the shawl thee is a stitch chart at the end of the document copyright oktarine 2020 reproduction and publication of pictures and pattern is not allowed 2 instructions start with a magic_ring turn after every row row 1 3 chain + 4 double_crochet 2ch 5 double_crochet row 2 3 chain + 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet bpdc chain skip 1 2 fpdc 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 2-chain-space 2 fpdc skip 1 chain bpdc 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 3 3 chain + 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 3 bpdc chain 3 fpdc chain skip 1 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 2-chain-space skip 1 chain 3 fpdc chain 3 bpdc chain 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 4 3 chain + 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet fpdc chain 3 bpdc chain 3 fpdc chain 2 bpdc 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 2-chain-space 2 bpdc chain 3 fpdc chain 3 bpdc chain fpdc 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 5 3 chain + 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain * 3 fpdc chain 3 bpdc chain * repeat until second-to-last st skip 1 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 2-chain-space skip 1 *chain 3 bpdc chain 3 fpdc * chain 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 6 3 chain + 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet bpdc chain * 3 fpdc chain 3 bpdc chain * repeat until last st 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 2-chain-space 2 fpdc * chain 3 bpdc chain 3 fpdc * chain bpdc 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet copyright oktarine 2020 reproduction and publication of pictures and pattern is not allowed 3 row 7 3 chain + 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain * 3 bpdc chain 3 fpdc chain * repeat until second-to-last st skip 1 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet in 2-chain-space skip 1 * chain 3 fpdc chain 3 bpdc * chain 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 8 4 chain + 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet * chain skip 1 double_crochet in 1-chain-space chain skip 1 double_crochet * repeat until last st chain double_crochet 2 chain double_crochet chain in 2-chain-space *double_crochet skip 1 chain double_crochet in 1-chain-space skip 1 chain * 1 double_crochet + chain + 1dc in last double_crochet row 9 3 chain + 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet *double_crochet
